products.title: Luscious Leaf Teal Blue Curtain
products.description: This bold leaf print, creates a modern, vibrant finish. A repeating botanical print, this luscious leaf curtain is just the thing to create a modern, cosy look. Consisting primarily of teal blue palette, with splashes of light sea blue and woody browns, this botanical curtain uses this years trend colour to draw the eye and make a statement. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtain comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Fern Leaves Prussian Blue Curtain
products.description: This lush leafy design creates a fresh fern-loving look. In shade, prussian blue, this fern curtain creates an eye-catching focus point, and in a cool-toned blue shade, would look fabulous in a kitchen, office or living room. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtain comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind. Product id: db-cur1265 fabric colour: prussian blue material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes fern leaves prussian blue curtain in blue.

products.title: Choices Rosehip Leaf Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Let your home flourish with calmness and organic style with this choices rosehip leaf blue roller blind. This quaint pattern is reminiscent of emma bridgewaters earliest sketchbooks, full of afternoons spent drawing endless hawthorns, sloes and rosehips.

products.title: Bird Garden, Denim - Roman Blind
products.description: Leave your guests feeling refreshed and relaxed by making use of the beautifully blue bird garden in denim. This pretty roman blind is home to a distressed blue base, so suited to its name, which features adorable white birds and blooms that sit delicately on the fabric. Boost a guest bedroom by including the denim as part of an overall blue and white colour scheme. Fuse with bolder and lighter shades of blue, using white as a tempering neutral.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: A gorgeously fresh design, the scandi birds aqua has a softly energetic appearance, rooted in its contrasting shades of light oatmeal and vibrant aqua blue. The featured birds are sweet and characterful, covered in pretty detailing that adds to the attractiveness of this blind. Bring a quick punch of colour to a neutral hallway or upstairs landing by adding the aqua. Surround it with white walls and accessories in matching oatmeal shades, keeping the scheme light and airy for the perfect welcome.

products.title: Superstar, Denim - Roman Blind
products.description: Stonewashed denim mixes with a fresh, vibrant cobalt and a subdued stone grey in this bright yet calming offering from the superstar range. The gentle drapes of the roman blind soften the effect of the angled stars, resulting in an eclectic and fun feel that will work in any home. Fun shapes such as these don't have to be restricted to children's bedrooms and playrooms. Why not give your office a funky yet calming vibe by hanging the denim in there amongst cool baby blue or pure white walls, accessorising with white furniture and matching blue fabrics? Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.

products.title: Skye Aruba Blue (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Secret Garden Faux Silk Inky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Floral designs arent often considered when youre looking for contemporary furnishings, but this stunning and refined roman blind is definitely an exception. The climbing leaf pattern, with its painterly watercolour style, is cast in a palette of modern favourites, teals and floral designs arent often considered when youre looking for contemporary furnishings, but this stunning and refined roman blind is definitely an exception.

products.title: Rosebud Powder Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Big, blooming and absolutely marvellous. This rosebud powder blue roman blind is what the orla kiely house collection is all about; bringing bold designer style to your home, at blinds 2go prices. This particular design fuses block colour and pattern, bold shapes and etched d big, blooming and absolutely marvellous.

products.title: Two Colour Stem Powder Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Orla kiely may be famed for her retro prints and simple style and its certainly never been truer than with this two colour stem powder blue roman blind. Beautiful oversized stems are coloured in a beautiful palette. The calming blue is met with a soft pale cream background a orla kiely may be famed for her retro prints and simple style and its certainly never been truer than with this two colour stem powder blue roman blind.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush River Blue Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their river blue colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce a bright blue colour into their room.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Ink Blue Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their ink blue colour - a sophisticated and modern blue tone perfect for a glamorous decor scheme.

products.title: Faux Suede, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in navy comes the darkest of blues, an almost-black midnight affair. This deep hue is softened by its gentle, touchable texture, one that could be easily mistaken for the real thing. The timeless shade of the navy will work fantastically as a dark accent for an all-white home office. Add silvers or golds for a contemporary and glamorous edge, or choose stripes and polka dots to provide some extra cuteness to the scheme.

products.title: Liliana French Blue Roman Blind
products.description: The light blue here has a smoky mellow feel that will give any room a soft and gentle touch at the window. Coordinating easily with other blue tones as well as neutral or white spaces this blind is just lovely. Of special note is the liliana fabric with it subtle woven texture the light blue here has a smoky mellow feel that will give any room a soft and gentle touch at the window.

products.title: Cellular Navy Blue Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Expressions Blue Clouds Blackout Blind For Velux  Windows
products.description: Sit back and allow your troubles to glide away with the simple, soft and serene design of the expressions blue clouds blind, made especially for velux windows. With delicate textures and an airy theme flowing through the space, this blind is the perfect finishing touch to mak sit back and allow your troubles to glide away with the simple, soft and serene design of the expressions blue clouds blind, made especially for velux windows.

products.title: Harlow Midnight Blue Roman Blind
products.description: What could be better than a wonderful roman blind to soften an industrial space? The harlow midnight blue roman blind softens any scheme, and does it beautifully too. The weaving of blue against white and grey creates a tone thats not only cossetting, but calm too, making it what could be better than a wonderful roman blind to soften an industrial space? The harlow midnight blue roman blind softens any scheme, and does it beautifully too.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Teal & Spring Roller Blind
products.description: This thermal luxe dimout teal roller blind feels bright at the window. The blue-green textured blind is finished off with a collection of spring-like pom-poms made from tightly woven threads. Whether you have a bold, maritime look in your home or simply accents of blue and whit this thermal luxe dimout teal roller blind feels bright at the window.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Blue Mist & Henley Roller Blind
products.description: As if the scandi blue colourway of this thermal luxe blind wasnt trendy enough, it also has a chic, ever so slightly kitsch decorative trim, made from woven threads in soft cream and shades of blue, to give it even more style. You could certainly hang this blind amongst greens as if the scandi blue colourway of this thermal luxe blind wasnt trendy enough, it also has a chic, ever so slightly kitsch decorative trim, made from woven threads in soft cream and shades of blue, to give it even more style.

products.title: Woven Acorn Cup Mid Powder Blue Roman Blind
products.description: The retro, scandi vibes that we get from this beautiful woven acorn cup roman blind are the work of esteemed designer orla kiely and will dress your windows in style. This plush, jacquard fabric with its 60s geometric pattern is picked out in a delightful powder blue to add calmn the retro, scandi vibes that we get from this beautiful woven acorn cup roman blind are the work of esteemed designer orla kiely and will dress your windows in style.

products.title: Choices Horizon Azure Roller Blind
products.description: This beautiful graduated ombre design will make a stunning accent piece at your window. More than just shading, it will add contemporary style and chic to your surroundings. The colourway is a cool, calming blend of aquatic blue tones that will help create a relaxed, laid back sp this beautiful graduated ombre design will make a stunning accent piece at your window.

products.title: Rich Teal Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Como, Cherry - Roman Blind
products.description: The sweet, dotty blossoms of the como cherry have a gorgeously watercolour effect to them, only emphasised by the rich red shade that stands out against the soft charcoal grey and rich cream it sits against. The cherry would work perfectly for adding a bold, yet not overwhelming, burst of colour to an otherwise neutral or white bathroom, cloakroom, or utility room. Keep the walls light and unobtrusive, accenting with the occasional matching red and grey for added depth and character.
